Text:
Classification: Game Show
Genre: Tech/Gaming
Status: Returning Series
Network: Channel 31 ( Australia)
Premiere: April 23, 2012

Made by a large portion of the team behind Level3, New Game Plus is a new look and take on gaming TV. Incorporating a strong gaming focus, with a healthy dose of related subcultures, NG+ aims to bring you thoughtful reviews, exclusive interviews and event coverage, and the best videos from a range of specialist contributors. (Source: newgameplus.tv)

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-34130)
